EnExplanation: A term used to indicate that something is being added or included with what has already been mentioned.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma lähen poodi, lisaks ostan ka leiba.
Samples.EnSentence: I am going to the store, in addition I will also buy some bread.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma lähen poodi, lisaks ostan ka leiba.
Samples.EnSentence: I am going to the store, in addition I will also buy bread.
